blocks.text:
**This is my first entry in the bionical grim of the twentyverrst century.** 



**really all thats on my mind is finish this, to be proud of something again**



**Gonna pack it up and leave verrgreen, to collect more castle spirits** 



**i wasted lots of time with the wrong folks** 



**it was all jus to prepare me for this**



**slug said true love is in the story** 

**agree**

**Danielle wont accept me, guess its anotherr bad ending** 

**Dont sacrafice your peace just to have any person around** 



**that lonely feeling where your a monk is the one you have because your chosen to love what your purpose is right now.** 



**girls always make me get stronger in the dungeon**

**what a blessing** 

**its like i have that one rune power where when your in love with someone your stats and exp are bonus x2**
